Recommendation System for Books¶

This is a documentation for the Recommendation System for Books bachelor thesis project created by Paweł Rzepiński and Ryszard Szymański.

The booksuggest package is the recommendation module designed for preparing the data, training models and evaluating them. It also exposes an interfaces to obtain recommendations from models.

The app folder contains a web application written in the Dash framework which allow users to explore the dataset and provide an interactive way to experience how the implemented recommendation models work.

Contents:

  • booksuggest package
    • Data preparation package
      • download_dataset script
      • extract_xml_files script
      • xml_parser module
      • clean_book script
      • clean_book_tags script
      • prepare_description script
      • prepare_similar_books script
      • ratings_train_test_split script
    • Feature engineering package
      • build_tag_features script
    • Models training package
      • cb_recommend_models module
      • content_analyzer module
      • tf_idf_models script
      • cf_recommend_models module
      • cf_slopeone_models script
      • cf_knn_models script
      • cf_svd_models script

      • model_exceptions module
    • Models evaluation package
      • cb_predict_models script
      • cb_evaluation script
      • cf_predict_models script
      • cf_accuracy_evaluation script
      • cf_effectiveness_evaluation script
      • metrics module
    • Utilities package
      • csv_utils module
      • logging module
      • serialization module
